I just got Hillsborough's Shinsengumi book (and still feel somewhat
violate=
d for paying $30 for a 200 page book) and I notice on page 33
it says that =
Shimada Kai studied Shinkeito Ryu in Edo, but everywhere
else indicates Shi=
ngyoto Ryu- was this just a mistake, or is there
more to it?

As an aside, =
I found "propensity to kill" 4 times while literally just
flipping to rando=
m pages. I would consider that an error on the part
of the editor. A somewh=
at unforgivable one, in fact. Ouch.

I am finding it an interesting read, t=
hough, I don't mind the writing
style.
